SERVER.name: DecodeJSON
SERVER.helpText: converts a json string to a squirrel table

SERVER.name: EncodeJSON
SERVER.helpText: converts a squirrel table to a json string

SERVER.name: StringToAsset
SERVER.helpText: converts a given string to an asset

SERVER.name: NSDisconnectPlayer
SERVER.helpText: Disconnects the player from the server with the given reason

SERVER.name: GetUserInfoKVString_Internal
SERVER.helpText: Gets the string value of a given player's userinfo convar by name
SERVER.argTypes: entity player, string key, string defaultValue = ""

SERVER.name: GetUserInfoKVAsset_Internal
SERVER.helpText: Gets the asset value of a given player's userinfo convar by name
SERVER.argTypes: entity player, string key, asset defaultValue = $""

SERVER.name: GetUserInfoKVInt_Internal
SERVER.helpText: Gets the int value of a given player's userinfo convar by name
SERVER.argTypes: entity player, string key, int defaultValue = 0

SERVER.name: GetUserInfoKVFloat_Internal
SERVER.helpText: Gets the float value of a given player's userinfo convar by name
SERVER.argTypes: entity player, string key, float defaultValue = 0

SERVER.name: GetUserInfoKVBool_Internal
SERVER.helpText: Gets the bool value of a given player's userinfo convar by name
SERVER.argTypes: entity player, string key, bool defaultValue = false

SERVER.name: NSSendMessage
SERVER.argTypes: int playerIndex, string text, bool isTeam

SERVER.name: NSBroadcastMessage
SERVER.argTypes: int fromPlayerIndex, int toPlayerIndex, string text, bool isTeam, bool isDead, int messageType

SERVER.name: NSGetCurrentModName
SERVER.helpText: Returns the mod name of the script running this function

SERVER.name: NSGetCallingModName
SERVER.helpText: Returns the mod name of the script running this function

SERVER.name: NS_InternalMakeHttpRequest
SERVER.helpText: [Internal use only] Passes the HttpRequest struct fields to be reconstructed in native and used for an http request
SERVER.argTypes: int method, string baseUrl, table<string, array<string> > headers, table<string, array<string> > queryParams, string contentType, string body, int timeout, string userAgent

SERVER.name: NSIsHttpEnabled
SERVER.helpText: Whether or not HTTP requests are enabled. You can opt-out by starting the game with -disablehttprequests.

SERVER.name: NSIsLocalHttpAllowed
SERVER.helpText: Whether or not HTTP requests can be made to a private network address. You can enable this by starting the game with -allowlocalhttp.
